content.question: Which of the following intervals is a minor seventh?

choices.label: Stacked half notes in bass clef. The bottom note is C3 and the top note is B3.
Stacked half notes in bass clef. The bottom note is C3 and the top note is B-flat 3.
Stacked half notes in bass clef. The bottom note is C3 and the top note is G3.
Stacked half notes in bass clef. The bottom note is C3 and the top note is G-flat 3.

content.answer: Stacked half notes in bass clef. The bottom note is C3 and the top note is B-flat 3.

unit.text: 2: Music Fundamentals II - Minor Scales and Key Signatures, Melody, Timbre, and Texture

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in notated music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
